name: Waiting for Boomshine
description:
Waiting for Boomshine is an open source clone of the flash game boomshine made in remade in godot. The total time it took me to develop it was probably around 6 hours.

Playing field is infinite, can expand as far as your device size. Minimum size is 512x512.

HTML version uses GLES2 so it will work on more devices.

The version here has no sound effects but the project is setup for drag and drop popping sounds.

If you like this project, maybe check out some of my others. :)
